short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start Google Meet calls instantly with just a click of a button!

Get on a NEW Google Meet call with just a click of button; To make it even more convenient, the link is automatically copied so you can pass it on to others. For the lazy ones, you save a whole 7-10 seconds with this easy access ðŸ˜‚
